snippet: An executive of Emigrant Bank rebuts a column critical of the bank’s loans to borrowers with bad credit.
lead_paragraph: An executive of Emigrant Bank rebuts a column critical of the bank’s loans to borrowers with bad credit.

headline.print_headline: Defending a Loan Program: Emigrant Bank’s Rebuttal
